AD.name: Number of time steps
AD.description: Enter number of time steps, must be integer > 0

AD.name: Number of initial nodes
AD.description: Enter number of initial nodes, must be integer > 0

AD.name: Number of edges
AD.description: Enter number of edges, must be integer > 0 and <= number of initial nodes

AD.name: Specify random number seed
AD.description: If you wish to provide your own random number generator seed, check this box
